pr_title: GEODE-7742: move membership unit tests to geode-membership

timeline.message:
GEODE-7742: move membership unit tests to geode-membership

Moving health monitor test to geode-membership
added address of locator providing FindCoordinatorResponses
added address of locator providing FindCoordinatorResponses
removing the use of reset and removing threads from test failing stress-testing

timeline.bodyText: Where are these stats being used? Is it ok that they are not thread-safe?
timeline.author: Bill

replies.bodyText: @Bill The stats are being used in unit tests
replies.author: bschuchardt

replies.bodyText:
Am I wrong to be concerned about (lack of) synchronization on these fields?
I understand the stakes are low on test code—but I wonder if the uncoordinated access could lead to test flakiness. Happy to be talked out of this position :)
replies.author: Bill
